name: mod-assessment
description: a back-end FOLIO module for assessment

scripts.build: npm run clean && babel src -x ".js,.ts" --out-dir dist
scripts.deploy-docs: npm run generate-docs && gh-pages --dist docs --message "[skip ci] Updates"
scripts.develop: nodemon -e js,ts --exec "npm run build && npm run start" --legacy-watch --watch src
scripts.docker-build: npm run build && docker build -t ua/$npm_package_name .
scripts.generate-docs: npm run clean && mkdir docs && raml2html ramls/assessment-api.raml > docs/index.html
scripts.okapi-post-descriptors: npm run okapi-post-module-descriptor && npm run okapi-post-deployment-descriptor && npm run okapi-enable
scripts.okapi-deploy: npm run okapi-undeploy && npm run docker-build && npm run okapi-post-descriptors
scripts.okapi-undeploy: npm run okapi-disable && npm run okapi-delete-deployment-descriptor && npm run okapi-delete-module-descriptor

author: The University of Alabama Libraries
